Articles.Content:
I don't really use refueling stations as much since they brought in the NASA parts, but I felt like building one and I thought this was a neat way to do it.

It's largely stock. KAS to make the supply depot, and the little runabout was made with Procedural Parts. It's not particularly elegant, but I like the look of it. A little Suessian? Maybe Whos and Kerbals are related, somewhere back in the mists of time...

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I love it! I wish I could think up a Suessian rhyme just now.
